name: Santa's Gift Delivery
description:
HO HO HO, Merry Christmas !

The holiday season arrives, bringing with lots of presents ! Help Santa Claus to distribute them to everyone, but be careful to stay on rhythm ! 

We made this little rhythm game during the Extra Credits jam with the theme "Present". 

Hope you will enjoy it !

Controls :

D and F : Red present

J and K : Green present 

Credits:

Benoît Deneaux

Cyprien Ravidat

Lisa Fontaine

17 minutes after the end of the jam, the debug version is out.
